summary: An ordinance providing for the issuance of refunding bonds of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of refunding and paying bonds of said city which will mature July 1, 1913, known as Seattle Refunding Bonds of 1893, 2nd Series, in the sum of $495,000 and providing for the issuance and sale thereof, and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof, and declaring an emergency.
